summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the assessment on the south One Hundred Twenty (120) feet of an unplatted strip of land, between Block One (1), Hazeltine's Heights Addition, and Block Two (2), Ayer and O'Hara's Addition, levied for the improvement of Thirty-third Avenue and other Streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, as provided for in Ordinance No. 11027, creating Local Improvement District No. 943.
